signup.minPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters
signup.Privacy: I agree with UniqAlpha Terms of Service,Privacy Policy and default Notification Settings.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password ?
forgotPassword.description: Enter the email address or phone number you used when you  signed up and we'll send you instructions to reset your  password.
forgotPassword.security: For security reasons, we do not store your password. So rest assured that we will never send your password via email or phone number.
forgotPassword.request: Request to reset password send successfully

newPassword.title: New password
newPassword.minPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters

AboutPage.title: Learn more about Uniq Alpha
AboutPage.Introduction: At  UniqAlpha, we are committed  to connecting  businesses  with highquality  industrial  machinery . Our  platform serves  as  a free online marketplace,enabling you to easily find  the equipment you need and connect with reputable sellers worldwide.
AboutPage.Categories: We offer a  wide  range of  categories , including  Machine Tools  Printing ,Test, Lab  & Medical  Equipment, Construction, Material Handling , and  Agriculture, catering to various  industry needs.
AboutPage.Team: Our  team consists of experienced professionals who understand the unique  requirements  of our clients, providing  a  secure and efficient platform for buying and selling industrial machinery.â€¨
AboutPage.Mission: Our mission is simple:to facilitate the process of buying and  industrial equipment at no cost to our users.

Hero.Help: to help your business grow and succeed.

Support.description: Share your questions and comments with Uniq Alpha support
Support.Subject: Subject

ResetPass.description: Your password must be at least 6 characters and should include a combination of numbers, letters and special characters (!$@%).
ResetPass.LogOutOtherDevicesMessage: Log out of other devices. Choose this if someone else used your account.

DeleteAccount.description: We're sorry to see you go! Before proceeding, please read the following important information carefully to fully understand the consequences of this action.
DeleteAccount.deletingYourAccountMean: What does deleting your account mean?
DeleteAccount.PermanentDataDeletion: Permanent Data Deletion: All your personal data, including username, email address, account settings, and associated content, will be permanently removed from our system.
DeleteAccount.LossOfAccess: Loss of Access: Once your account is deleted, you will no longer have access to your profile, activity history, transactions, or any saved content.
DeleteAccount.IrreversibleAction: Irreversible Action: This process is irreversible, and once confirmed, your account cannot be restored.
DeleteAccount.ConsiderBeforeDeleting: Before you delete your account, please consider
DeleteAccount.SupportHelp: If you're experiencing any issues or concerns, our support team is here to help.
DeleteAccount.TemporaryDeactivation: If you just need a break, you can temporarily deactivate your account and return whenever.
DeleteAccount.ConfirmDeletionMessage: By deleting your account, you confirm that you fully understand the consequences and agree to the permanent removal of your data.
DeleteAccount.ConfirmDeleteCheckbox: Yes, I understand this action is permanent and I agree to delete my account.
